item.title: Migrating data from SQL to Dgraph
item.description: Dgraph is rapidly gaining reputation as an easy to use database to build apps upon. Many new users of Dgraph have existing relational databases that they want to migrate from.

item.title: How Access Control Works in Dgraph
item.description: With GDPR passing in the EU on April 14th, 2016, users on the Internet are demanding protection of their privacy and data from Internet companies.
